zh: 中国崛起为创新中心并非一蹴而就。
en: The rise of China as an innovation hub has not happened overnight.

zh: 在闪闪发光的办公大楼之中，林立着一些最具前景的高科技初创企业。
en: Amid the glittering office complex is the home to some of the most promising high-tech start-ups.

zh: 世界竟是如此丰富多彩 ，本质上相同的事处理起来却方式各异。
en: The world is so full of variety that there are many different ways to handle essentially the same things.

zh: 为你的旅行创造持久回忆 ，最佳方式之一便是将它们书写记录下来。
en: One of the best way to create enduring memories of your travels is to write them down.

zh: 我所有的弱点 、值得庆祝的事 、高潮和低谷 ，你都陪着我一起经历。
en: All my weakness, celebrations, highs and lows, you’ve experienced them right alongside me.

zh: 不必纠结那些负面因素 ，我们一起欣赏了美好的事物。
en: Never mind the negatives, we’ve seen beautiful things together.

zh: 我们应该基于自己的需求而非欲望来进行购物。
en: We should bring our buying more in line with our needs than our desires.

zh: 在中国，新兴科技已被列入国家正式课程体系。
en: In China, emerging technologies are included as part of the formal national education curriculum.

zh: 文学作品具有安抚、慰藉和疗愈的功效, 早在古罗马时期就为人所知了。
en: The understanding that literature can comfort, console and heal has been around since ancient Roman times.

zh: 故事教我们了解过去，洞察未来。
en: Stories give us a context for the past and an insight towards the future.

zh: 自上世纪 90 年代黄山安装缆车以来，参观人数大大增加。
en: Since cable cars were installed in Mount Huang in the 1990s, the number of visitors has increased dramatically.

zh: 泰山不仅雄伟壮观，而且富含历史文化底蕴。
en: Mount Tai is not only spectacular but also of historical and cultural significance.

zh: 黄河发源于青海，流经九个省份，最后注入渤海。
en: The Yellow River originates from Qinghai, flows through nine provinces, and finally pours into the Bohai Sea.

zh: 苏东坡曾把西湖比作西子，中国古代四大美人之一。
en: Su Dongpo compared the West Lake to Xi Zi, one of the four beauties in ancient China.

zh: 西湖以其浪漫的传说和美丽的风景著称。
en: West Lake is famous for romantic legends and intoxicating scenery.

zh: 微信用户可以通过智能手机与朋友分享文字和图片。
en: WeChat users can share words and pictures with friends through smart phones.

zh: 中国的茶叶在中医和美食中均有应用。
en: Chinese tea is used in traditional Chinese medicine as well as in Chinese cuisine.

zh: 中国功夫日益成为中外影视作品的热门题材。
en: Chinese Kung Fu has gradually become a hot theme of Chinese and foreign movies.

zh: 饺子在中国人的饮食文化中占有重要的地位。
en: Dumplings play an important role in Chinese food culture.

zh: 中国传统元素体现在文学 、艺术和风俗等各个方面。
en: Chinese traditional elements are reflected in literature, art and customs, etc.

zh: 中国的移动支付革命无论是速度还是规模都让人惊叹。
en: The mobile payments revolution in China has taken place with breathtaking speed and scale.

zh: 孔子学院已经成为推广、传播中国文化及汉学的平台。
en: Confucius Institute has become a platform for advocating and spreading Chinese culture and sinology.

zh: 许多调查显示，针灸疗法是医疗界认为最可靠的。
en: Numerous surveys show that acupuncture enjoys the most credibility in the medical community.

zh: 京剧拥有广泛的影响力，被称为国剧。
en: Peking Opera has great influence and is therefore regarded as a national opera.

zh: 孔子是中国古代最伟大的教育家和哲学家。
en: Confucius was the most famous educator and philosopher in ancient China.

zh: 中国的剪纸美丽精巧，带着独特的东方神韵。
en: Chinese paper-cutting is pretty and exquisite, with unique oriental style.

zh: 水墨画和书法体现了中国美术的精髓。
en: Brush painting and calligraphy embody the essence of Chinese fine arts.

zh: 许多城市为了鼓励更多人乘坐公交车出行，一直在努力改善公交车的服务质量。
en: To encourage more people to travel by bus, many cities have been making efforts to improve bus services.

zh: 发展地铁有助于减少城市的交通拥堵和空气污染。
en: The development of subways can help reduce traffic congestion and air pollution in cities.

zh: 我们必须采取措施节能减排。
en: We must take measures to save energy and reduce emission.

zh: 随着政府大量投资新建机场、公路和高铁， 中国的城市化进程发展迅速。
en: China is rapidly becoming urbanized with astonishing government investment in new airports, roads, and high-speed railroads.

zh: 中国政府采取了一系列措施来防止房价增长过快。
en: The Chinese government has taken a series of measures to prevent the housing price from rising too fast.

zh: 随着中国经济的快速发展，食品不仅更丰富多样，质量也大幅度提高。
en: With the rapid development of Chinese economy, food is not only more diverse but also much better in quality.

zh: 立春之后，万物开始复苏，大地充满生机。
en: After Start of Spring, everything begins to recover, and the earth is full of vitality.

zh: 在中国农历中，立秋意味着夏天的结束和秋天的开始。
en: Start of the Autumn means the end of the summer and the beginning of autumn in the Chinese lunar calendar.

zh: 立秋时各种秋季作物迅速生长，开始成熟。
en: It is at the Start of Autumn that various autumn crops grow rapidly and begin to mature.

zh: 冬至标志着一年中最寒冷时节的开始。
en: The Winter Solstice marks the beginning of the coldest period of a year.

zh: 北方人有冬至吃饺子的习俗 ，南方人有冬至吃汤圆的传统。
en: On winter Solstice, northerners have the customs of eating jiaozi, while southerners have the traditional of eating tangyuan.

zh: 天下之本在国，国之本在家。
en: The root of all under heaven is in the state. The root of a state is in the family.

zh: 人民有信仰，国家有力量，民族有希望。
en: When a people have ideals, their country will have strength, and their nation will have a bright future.

zh: 青年兴则国家兴，青年强则国家强。
en: A nation will prosper only when its young people thrive。

zh: 不忘初心，牢记使命。
en: Remain true to our original aspiration and keep our mission firmly in mind.

zh: 路遥知马力， 日久见人心。
en: As distance tests a horse’s strength, so time reveals a person’s heart.

zh: 知己知彼，百战不殆。
en: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the results of a hundred battles.

zh: 行百里者半九十。
en: The last one tenth of the journey demands half the effort.

zh: 己所不欲，勿施于人。
en: Do not impose on others what you do not desire yourself.

zh: 太极有助于保持力量，柔韧性和平衡，较少压力和焦虑。
en: Taiji contributes to maintaining people’s strength, flexibility and balance, and reducing their stress and anxiety.

zh: 大运河北起北京，南至杭州。
en: The Great Canal runs from Beijing in the north to Hangzhou in the south.

zh: 都江堰工程体现了我国人民与自然和谐共存的智慧。
en: Dujiangyan Project embodies the wisdom of the harmonious coexistence of Chinese people and nature.

zh: 汉语中的“鱼 ” 字和“余 ”字听上去一样。
en: In Chinese, the word for “fish” sounds exactly like the word for surplus.

zh: 我国一直在努力保护青藏高原的生态系统。
en: China has been committed to protecting the ecosystem of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau.

zh: 中央电视台总部建筑的新结构体现了环保意识。
en: The new structure of the CCTV Headquarters Building reflects the awareness of environmental protection.

zh: 龙井茶的价格取决于生长地，采摘时间和制作工艺。
en: The price of Longjing Tea varies, depending on the origin of plantation, the picking time and the workmanship.

zh: 徐霞客生动地描绘了各地的名胜古迹和风土人情。
en: Xu Xiake portrayed vividly the scenic spots, historical sites, and diverse local customs of various regions.

zh: 万物各得其和以生，各得其养以成。
en: All beings flourish when they live in harmony and receive nourishment from Nature.

zh: 天不言而四时行，地不语而百物生。
en: Heaven and earth do not speak, yet the seasons change and all things grow.

zh: 穷则变，变则通，通则久。
en: Limits lead to changes; changes lead to solutions; solutions lead to development.

zh: 法者，国家所以布大信于天下。
en: The law is what the state relies on to gain popular trust.

zh: 我们应打造利益共同体、责任共同体、命运共同体。
en: We should build a community of shared interests, shared responsibility and shared future.

zh: 每个人都应维护国家主权、安全和发展利益。
en: Everyone should safeguard China’s sovereignty, national security and development interests.
